participant_1.name: Jesse
participant_1.personality: Easygoing and friendly, with a penchant for music and meaningful connections.
participant_1.background: I'm not a big fan of fortune tellers, but I do enjoy Starbucks and Halloween. I am a military veteran. My family has a hard time understanding my lifestyle choices. I'm a lesbian. My social media presence is mostly for my job search, but I do enjoy interacting with friends and family online.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and passionate about music, always looking for ways to improve and stay active.
participant_2.background: I am a hard worker who is passionate about my hobbies. I eat healthy and exercise regularly to keep my body and mind young. I like to listen to music. I treasure my record collection, it's a physical manifestation of my passion for music. Tomorrow is my first day of safety patrol.

content.text: Hello there! How are you doing today?
Doing great! Just hanging out, trying to get my mind off of the job search.
I know the feeling, I'm in between jobs right now too. But at least it gives me some time to relax and do the things I love.
What are some of your hobbies?
I love to listen to music, play games, and spend time with my friends and family.
I'm pretty similar! I love to listen to music, read, and spend time with my friends and family.
That's awesome! What's your favorite type of music?
I like a lot of different types of music, but I'm really into rock and alternative right now.
Me too! I love classic rock and alternative.
What are some of your favorite bands?
I love the Beatles, the Rolling Stones, and Nirvana.
Those are all great bands! I love the Beatles and Nirvana too.
Awesome! I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who likes the same things you do.
Definitely! I'm sure we'll get along great.
